definition: "speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]
handsome/refined/elegant/graceful/superior/show (loanword)/CL:場|场[chang2]/(literary) to grow/to bloom/(of crops) to produce ears
to induce/to encourage/to provide guidance/(medicine, chemistry) induction
to coerce (sb into doing sth bad)/to lure (into a trap)/to seduce
to entice/to lure/to scam/to hoodwink/to decoy
to lure into/to entrap/to trick into/to entice/to induce/to invite/to tempt
to use gain as a lure
to lure into a trap/to trap/to capture

sentences.english: They might not layer great cause of the crushed ice .
sentences.chinese: 因为诱了碎冰，所以分层的时间不会太久。

sentences.english: The connecting end of the fish collecting net and the fish attracting net is provided with a V-shaped net door.
sentences.chinese: 集鱼网与诱鱼网的连接端设有一个八字网门。

sentences.english: Mora's hunger lures her back to the warthog burrow.
sentences.chinese: 莫拉的饥饿把它诱回到疣猪洞。

sentences.english: When the postman arrived, I was leaving the house.
sentences.chinese: 诱孑员到达时，我正要离开那所房子。

sentences.english: It says that ‘More traps will lure you away.
sentences.chinese: 别忘了那句话‘陷阱诱你上钩’。

sentences.english: What tempts me to come here to make?
sentences.chinese: 诱我来这里到底要做什么？

sentences.english: Then Lim lowered the hook without bait.
sentences.chinese: 于是，林把没有诱铒的钩垂下水去。

sentences.english: That was just a ruse, to get you to click the link.
sentences.chinese: 这只是一个诡计，诱你点击链接，阅读文章。

sentences.english: "Learning your hard to teach your good pedagogues ".

definition: to coerce (sb into doing sth bad)/to lure (into a trap)/to seduce
to cheat/to swindle/to pretend/to feign/to draw sb out/to try to extract information by deceit or bluff
to lure into/to entrap/to trick into/to entice/to induce/to invite/to tempt
to beat sb at their own game (idiom)
lit. to pull a snake from its hole/to expose a malefactor (idiom)
to threaten the east and strike to the west (idiom)/to create a diversion
to spur sb into action by making negative remarks

to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters
